post.body: do it. suntory is great!
does the losing team even get to be in the calendar? all those paintball bruises aren't going to be pretty. #teamtequila
In and out of LAX in 4 minutes, cuz I know what's up. Mmm, In N Out.
I am Awake at Five Thirty, and Capable of Using the Shift KEY.
I just bought myself a small, expensive electronic part for every night of hanukkah. DAMN YOU, Sparkfun Electronics. Why can't I quit you?
As of tonight, I finally have a clean workshop again. To celebrate I'm going to disassemble a power supply. And drink. In unspecified order.
Demo'ed ArtFall at Applied Minds today. That didn't suck either.
Presented artfall at mindshare la. That was a great big flaming bag of win.
My robot demo has been moved to next month! I have time to fix it! I can now un-cry. *sigh of relief*
3am. still coding madly. so many successes tonight. SO much left to finish! sleep now.
OMG ice cream best dinner ever.
Hey rad. KCRW just played Monsters from Mutaytor's new album on the radio!
Rain is for places upstream. Aqueducts were invented so I never have to get wet. Weather FTL.
Cirque berzerk clown photo shoot. I do have teeth in real life. http://snipurl.com/85k47
I cannot afford the high social cost of eating at urth cafe. Like exposure to small dogs wearing sweaters and their owners.
Looking at ChucK for audio synthesis/analysis over puredata. PD makes my eyes bleed. And I can do livecoding in ChucK. Your poor ears!
woohoo! rhythm detector (in puredata) running in linux. Live-tunable with OSC msgs from iPhone, & sending OSC "/thump" to python simulator.
Learning how to send and receive OSC messages in C++, python, and puredata. puredata was designed to drive programmers mad, btw.
This is a fully armed and operational hangover.
I liked my commute @ $2.50/g. My time is worth more than sitting in traffic.
